mapper.insert:
insert into board(b_cno,b_title,b_content, b_reward, b_write_time,b_end_time,b_mno, bi_name, b_addr1, b_addr2, b_addr3) values (#{bCno},#{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{bReward},sysdate, #{bEndTime}, #{bMno},#{biName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bAddr1},#{bAddr2},#{bAddr3})
select board_seq.currval from dual
mapper.select: select b_cno, b_no, b_mno, b_title, b_reward, TO_CHAR(b_write_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_write_time, b_end_time, b_addr3, b_status from board where b_cno=#{bCno} and (b_end_time >= (sysdate-1)) and b_status=0 order by b_no desc

select b_mno, b_no, b_title, b_content, bi_name, b_reward, b_addr1, b_addr2, TO_CHAR(b_write_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_write_time, TO_CHAR(b_end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_end_time, b_status, b_reward from board where b_no = #{bNo}
select count(*) from board where b_cno=#{bCno} and (b_end_time >= (sysdate-1)) and b_status=0
